\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 99766}

\subsection*{The Snorthing}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Ophelia}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 2400 mg & insufflated & Pharms - Bupropion & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 150.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have been snorting Wellbutrin for over 3 years now.  I started off snorting about 1200mg but have worked my way up.  



I recently experienced an intense, existential, kind of experience.  I took too much Wellbutrin, then things around me got weird, altered somehow.  The intensity grew until I was lying in bed, clutching a pillow, not sure of which `reality' I was experiencing.  My mind was racing so fast that I couldn't hang onto any substantial thought, so it was just chaos.  I'm not sure if this is called depersonalization or not?  



By the way, I use Dristan to clear your sinuses as you snort.

\end{document}
